name: The Jackanapes
description:
The Jackanapes is a fool, a goose, and a local spectacle. You’re exceptionally good at a given task, but you are self-taught and are the subject of constant ridicule. This optional class for MÖRK BORG grants a player early access to a feat, but at the price of mockery.

Dev-log

  • Released v 1.0.01
